name: MECS formed
description: The Methodist Episcopal Church, South formed after the slavery-related split in 1845.

name: MPC separated from MEC
description: The Methodist Protestant Church separated from the MEC in 1828.

name: Methodist Church formed
description: The Methodist Church formed by the 1939 reunion of MEC, MECS, and MPC.

name: United Methodist Church formed
description: The Methodist Church and the Evangelical United Brethren Church merged to form the UMC.
